eu.stratosphere.nephele.io

Class AbstractRecordReader<T extends Record>

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.stratosphere.nephele.io.AbstractRecordReader<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the record that can be read from this record reader.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MutableRecordReader, RecordReader

    public abstract class AbstractRecordReader<T extends Record>
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an abstract base class for a record reader, either dealing with mutable or immutable records.
    Author:
    warneke

      • publishEvent

        public final void publishEvent(AbstractTaskEvent event)
                        throws java.io.IOException,
                               java.lang.InterruptedException
        Publishes an event.
        Parameters:
        event - the event to be published
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if an error occurs while transmitting the event
        java.lang.InterruptedException - thrown if the thread is interrupted while waiting for the event to be published
